Breadth-First.Explanation: Initial broad clue collection, listing multiple features (cathedral, lawn, plaza, gardens, neighborhood) without deep verification.

Depth-First.Explanation: Convergent verification of a specific hypothesis by analyzing detailed architectural, streetscape, landscaping, and urban context clues.
Depth-First.KeyElement: Detailed breakdown of architecture, surrounding buildings, park layout, and pedestrian plaza

Depth-First.Explanation: Final confirmation of the precise geolocation based on the prior detailed analysis.
Depth-First.KeyElement: Explicit address “Christchurch Place, Medieval Quarter, Dublin, Ireland, Europe”

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Transitioned from broad descriptive clue gathering to focused, detailed verification of the Christchurch Cathedral hypothesis.
